channel.title: How to get a server online
channel.description:
how can i make a server online?
[glow=red,2,300]need help bigtime - how can i make it so more than 1 person can use my server [/glow][br][size=1]Posted on: March 01, 2007, 11:07:08 AM[/size][hr]please i need some help

item.title: How to get a server online

item.description:

make a hamachi network and when ppl join it they can play, if you have networks run your serverâ€¦easy
